long_description: Spacious enough to keep food for 2 cool, the REI Personal Cooler is great for adventures around town or in the mountains. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours; foam also protects fruit from bruising. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof and PVC-free; liner wipes clean quickly and easily. Zippered exterior pocket holds utensils and napkins (sold separately); side pockets hold water bottles and other essentials. Haul handle and adjustable shoulder strap let you easily transport the REI Personal cooler.
short_description: Spacious enough to keep food for 2 cool, the REI Personal Cooler is great for adventures around town or in the mountains.
